messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Uhhh sorry, we were sending some creatures via bluespace to a zoo.. we fucked up the coordiantes

Try not to kill him

-Steve from zoology

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Ok so, steve again, looks like you might have to hold onto that good boy, pochers are known to be intercepting bluespace transmissions in hopes of getting some endangered hides. I'll keep you posted when my boss tells me more.

Love,
Steve from zoology

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Mixing Chamber.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
yarr harr harr!
We be P.O.A.C.H.E.R, and we be collectin' all sorts o' rare animals for eheh, lets say 'less than legitmate means' harr harr!

We be noticin' that a certain bluespace transmission containing a rare animal got to YOU instead o' US... and we cant be havin' that now...

I thought that because I be such a good captain of my crew, I'd offer ye station lubbers a deal.. hand over that thar gondolar ye be harbourin, and we send you a little booty.. deal?

I'd say we should be communicating through the comms consoles for now, we be interceptin' centcoms messages yarr harr!!

-Pirate steve from the cannon department

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
yarr harr!

We aint be hearin from ye in a while! ye be using the comms console? Like I said, we be interceptin ALL o' tha messages to centcom yarr harr!!

We be gettin' MIGHTY impatient...

-Pirate Steve

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Yarr harr!
Our diplomat be here! he has some booty for ye if ye can deliver!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
yarr harr!
We told ye that we be interceptin those messages! you station lubbers!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Yarr harr!!
We never gave ye nothin!!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Yarr harr, we be leavin ya a little present for that, ye damnable AI

SO LONG, STATION LUBBERS!! YARR HARR HARR!!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Hope ye enjoyed that cannon ball!! yarr harr!!

Later fuckers! yarr harr

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
YARR HARR!!!

THIS BE PIRATE 2 ELECTRIC BOOGALOO!!

Ye thought ye could get away withy insulting us that easy eh? yarr harr! ye got another thing comin! me first mate has raided centcom and will be waiting for ye! 

PS: who ye think put that hole in yer shuttle, eh lads?

-Pirate Steve, with First Mate Boom Boom
